albus.predictor.tree

Class RegressionTreeLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.predictor.Learner
      • albus.predictor.tree.TreeLearner
        • albus.predictor.tree.RTreeLearner
          • albus.predictor.tree.RegressionTreeLearner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomRegressionTreeLearner, RobustRegressionTreeLearner

    public class RegressionTreeLearner
extends RTreeLearner
    Class for learning regression trees.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Trains a regression tree. 
         Usage: mltk.predictor.tree.RegressionTreeLearner
 -t     train set path
 [-r]   attribute file path
 [-o]   output model path
 [-V]   verbose (default: true)
 [-m]   construction mode:parameter. Construction mode can be alpha limited (a), depth limited (d), number of leaves limited (l) and minimum leaf size limited (s) (default: a:0.001)
 [-s]   seed of the random number generator (default: 0)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(double alpha)
        Sets the alpha. Alpha is the maximum proportion of the training set in the leaf node.
        Parameters:
        alpha - the alpha.
